title: Intentional self-poisoning by and exposure to carbon monoxide from other domestic fuels
chapter: External causes of morbidity and mortality
category: Intentional self-poisoning by and exposure to carbon monoxide and other gases and vapours
inclusion: Carbon monoxide from: charcoal in domestic stove, portable grill, barbecue or fireplace (free-standing)
Carbon monoxide from: coal in domestic stove, portable grill, barbecue or fireplace (free-standing)
Carbon monoxide from: coke in domestic stove, portable grill, barbecue or fireplace (free-standing)
Carbon monoxide from: kerosine or paraffin in domestic stove, portable grill, barbecue or fireplace (free-standing)
Carbon monoxide from: wood in domestic stove, portable grill, barbecue or fireplace (free-standing)
exclusion: carbon monoxide from smoke, fire and flames
